Name: Sharply C anything you want Dentistry
Mr. Great Hotel Anything You Want Good Price
Description: U fullfil your desire stay with us no?

Name: Creampie dreamland
Description: Creampie dreamland is where all your dreams come true

Name: Your mom's kitchen
Description: Michael's mom can cook some mapo tofu

Name: Mom's spaghetti
Description: There's vomit on your sweater already

Name: Lumberjack's Log Cabin
Description: Feel the real Canadian spirit in our cozy log cabin hotel. Just remember, we don't actually provide axes for log cutting!

Name: Fromage a Trois
Description: Cheese lovers, unite! In Fromage a Trois, we offer the widest selection of French cheeses. Careful, it's easy to get caught in a cheesy love triangle here!

Name: Jeeves & Wooster's
Description: Get served by your personal Jeeves at our classic British bar. Old fashioned? Always. Out of style? Never.

Name: Taco 'bout It
Description: Want to taco 'bout delicious food? Look no further. You'll be so full, you won't have room for words.

Name: Tipsy Teapot
Description: Our teapots might be tipsy, but our service is always on point. Join us for a fusion of traditional Chinese teas and modern mixology.

Name: Ciao Chow
Description: At Ciao Chow, we mix the best of Italian cuisine with...more Italian cuisine! Because you can never have too much pasta, right?

Name: Infinity Suites
Description: Infinity is not always a big number. Sometimes, it's just a very, very comfortable bed in a high-end suite overlooking Manhattan.

Name: Bed, Bath, and Breakfast
Description: We took a popular store concept and made it better - by adding a breakfast! Enjoy the most comfortable stay and the most important meal of the day.

Name: Eat Pray Sushi
Description: No need for a lengthy journey of self-discovery - all the enlightenment you need can be found in our delicious sushi rolls.

Name: The Code Bar
Description: A place where Java isn't just a drink order and Python isn't a snake. Enjoy our byte-sized appetizers and WiFi-infused cocktails.

Name: Poutine Machine
Description: Our dishes are a gravy train of deliciousness. With our poutine, every day is Fry-day.

Name: The Speakeasy Assembler
Description: Return to the 1920s with our clandestine bar. We don't keep the secret of making great cocktails hidden though.

Name: Holy Crepe!
Description: Prepare for an almost religious experience with our heavenly crepes. Sinfully delicious and divine in every bite.

Name: Mount Neverest
Description: Reach new heights of comfort without the need for a climbing gear. Mount Neverest - the peak of luxury.

Name: Ctrl+Alt+Delicious
Description: Reboot your taste buds with our exceptional cuisine. This is one error message your stomach will thank you for.

Name: The Frothy Programmer
Description: Debug your thirst at The Frothy Programmer, where our drinks are never short on bytes.

Name: Royal Flush Hotel
Description: You won't need a poker face to show your excitement while staying at our upscale hotel. The Royal Flush Hotel, where everyone feels like a high roller.

Name: Ravioliday Inn
Description: Experience the past with the comforts of the present at the Ravioliday Inn, where history meets luxury.

Name: Burger Monarchy
Description: Experience American cuisine with an English twist. All hail the Burger Monarchy!

Name: Brew Tang Clan
Description: The Brew Tang Clan ain't nothing to clink with! Join us for rhythm, rhymes and beer times.

Name: The Churrosboro Hotel
Description: Indulge in the sweet life at The Churrosboro Hotel, where every day feels like a fiesta.

Name: The Salty Pretzel
Description: Join us for a twist on traditional German cuisine at The Salty Pretzel. Prost!

Name: The Overflow Pub
Description: Our pints and stories overflow at The Overflow Pub. There's no better place to soak up Irish tradition.

Name: Baguetteaway Hotel
Description: Fall in love with the city of lights from the comfort of Baguetteaway Hotel. A slice of heaven in the heart of Paris.

Name: Taco'bout Delicious
Description: We need to taco'bout how delicious our food is. You won't believe it until you taste it.

Name: The Pour Decision
Description: The only poor decision you could make is not coming to The Pour Decision. Join us for great drinks and even better times.

Name: Comfort Inn-cognito
Description: Relaxation and privacy is our game at Comfort Inn-cognito. Slip into comfort and out of the limelight.

Name: Spaghetti Junction Inn
Description: Get lost in the sauce and our nonsensical city layout! Best viewed with a bowl of our signature spaghetti.

Name: Croissant Moon Hotel
Description: Experience the true Parisian lifestyle – fresh baked bread, artisanal cheese, and the occasional workers' strike. Très authentique!

Name: Big Ben's Burger Bonanza
Description: Where the burgers are as well-done as the Queen's English and the apologies are as frequent as rain. Sorry!

Name: Hofbräuhaus Light
Description: Perfectly timed happy hours and beers served with German precision. Because who has time for anything less than perfection?

Name: Mountie's Tavern
Description: We're sorry, but you'll have to try our maple-infused brew. And our poutine. We're sorry for that too. Did we apologize yet?

Name: Eagle's Nest Diner
Description: Experience dining in the land of the free and the home of the extra large. Portions as big as our patriotism!

Name: Matador's Retreat
Description: Enjoy the thrill of the bullfighting spirit, then retreat to your room for a midday siesta. Tapas provided upon waking.

Name: Pierogi Palace
Description: Fill up on traditional Polish dumplings and other dishes you can't pronounce. But trust us, they're delicious!

Name: Koala Suites
Description: Relax on the beach, throw a shrimp on the barbie, but watch out for the drop bears! They're worse than the spiders.

Name: Borsch Bed & Breakfast
Description: Experience the true Russian welcome with a shot of vodka upon arrival. It'll keep you warm in the harsh Moscow winter!
